title: Thousands of White Teens Brawled at a Mall and Nobody Was Arrested?
subtitle: A large brawl took place at a Kentucky mall in 2015, but according to police the crowd was racially mixed and no arrests were made due to the participants' ages.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: No arrests were made after thousands of young people got into a massive brawl at a Kentucky mall because everyone involved was white.
